titleStmt.title: Disloyalty of language questioned and censured, or, A sermon preached aginst the licencious loosenesse of seditious tongues by Rich. Towgood ... ; with a brief corollarie now added, questioning and censuring rebellious actions.
titleStmt.author: Towgood, Richard, 1595?-1683.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Rich. Harsell and are to be sold by him in Bristoll,

notesStmt.note: Imperfect: pages tightly bound with some loss of print.
Reproduction of original in the Trinity College Library, Dublin University.
